column5: Cozy Roosevelt Park Guesthouse. Our place is conveniently located south of downtown, with a 5 minute walk to the Riverwalk or to Freetail Brewery. From either location, you can rent a bike and get downtown, the missions and to many fun local neighborhoods. The Blue Star Arts District (1.5 miles), Southtown (1 mile), King William District (1.5 miles) and La Villita are all within easy reach by foot, bike, or car.
column8: Cozy Roosevelt Park Guesthouse, near Riverwalk!
